instruction: Peel the butternut squash and cut it into 1-inch cubes.
Fill a large saucepan with 1 inch of water.
Bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Place a steamer basket in the saucepan, ensuring the squash cubes don't touch the water.
Add the squash cubes to the steamer basket.
Cover the saucepan tightly with a lid and reduce heat to medium-low.
Steam the squash for 15-20 minutes, or until tender when pierced with a fork.
Drain any excess water from the steamer basket.
Serve immediately. You can mash the squash with a fork or enjoy it in cubes.
